price: Gayon, at pumaligid nga Kami sa anumang taglay niyang kabatiran.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
